page.title: 09CLOTHING
page.content: {Fashions}today can range from very baggy trousers to very tight trousers that people can hardly walk in, or very short skirts to very long skirts. Fashions are changing all the time for instance in the old days people used to wear very pointed black boots then people stopped wearing them and they went out of fashion, now they are back again. The clothes we wear are now bought in shops or made by hand with aid of a pattern. People will wear all sorts of things, different colours, sizes and lengths.
